title: Packing Service
des: We are giving the Packing Service for you. If yoy need to packing your products then we can provide these service.

title: Home Delivery
des: We have 64 brance-offices in 64 districts all over Bangladesh to provide Home Delivery for you.

title: Storing Service
des: There is sufficient amount of product storing place so that you can easily stored your products after buying.

title: Customer Care
des: We have at least one customer care center in every district to provide a high quality servicing facilities.

title: Easy Pay
des: You can pay for your products from any brance and also can collects them from any brance in Bangladesh
